section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: “Company” means a person or enterprise engaged in the generation or distribution of natural gas or electricity.
“Person” means any individual, corporation, company, association, firm, partnership, joint stock company, or other entity.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added June 12, 2003, D.C. Law 14-310, § 15, 50 DCR 1092

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Authority Under D.C. Law 13-281, the “Abatement and Condemnation of Nuisance Property Omnibus Amendment Act of 2002”, see Mayor’s Order 2002-33, March 1, 2002 ( 49 DCR 1875).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: The provisions of D.C. Law 14-310 replaced the provisions of D.C. Law 13-281. D.C. Law 13-281 was ineffective because of a defective effective date clause for Title 22.
